Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory700.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Phew. It's time.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Bridget claps her hands to draw everyone's attention."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'We still have a few minutes. Take this time to do one final check of your load.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Protect the survival tools and medical kits—we can't afford to lose any members to non-combat injuries.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget notices a Construct in new recruit gear looking anxious.'}
{3: 'She lets out a soft sigh.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'If you missed anything, you should hurry up and get it. Submitting to hesitation and shame could cost you dearly in battle.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The new recruit notices Bridget's knowing glance, gets up, and runs to the supply station, greeting you as he passes by."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Alright, let's take a two-minute break here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget tips her sunglasses as she walks over.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Nice of you to join us for a training session, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget puts emphasis on the word training.'}
{2: "It'd be nice to see you off the battlefield, you know.", 3: '20'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Supporting Gray Raven is a lot of work.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget drags you to her vehicle, where you can chat in peace.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "I've got to say, I was surprised the higher-ups were generous enough to put the battle simulator right here on the surface.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Last month, I broke a few processing units during simulation training and got chewed out for going over budget... "Support Force abused the battle simulator"? I was speechless.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'In actual combat, the wear and tear will be much more evident.', 3: '28'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "The simulation pod can't recreate a real battle—our job isn't just driving vehicles and hauling cargo.", 4: '1'}
{3: "There's self-mockery in Bridget's tone rather than anger."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'By the way...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: '...If something goes wrong, at least try not to make me look bad.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Nod)', 3: '35', 4: 'Hmm... That will depend on the training schedule.', 5: '35'}
{3: 'She lets out a hearty laugh and pats you on the back.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Relax, it's fine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'We take our jobs very seriously—support operations allow no room for mistakes.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Bridget's smile disappears and her expression turns serious."}
{3: 'She opens the saddlebag on her motorcycle and pulls out a paper map.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "There might be signal interference on Route 452, which you'll likely pass through. This usually works better in such situations.", 4: '1'}
{3: "You give a nod of thanks and accept the map covered in Bridget's multicolored notes and markings."}
{2: 'This is perfect...', 3: '46'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "It's almost time.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Bridget's relaxed posture tenses up and she pats you on the shoulder again."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I hope we'll work together on more missions like this, 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Good luck, everyone!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'All units, gear up! Begin operation!', 4: '1'}
{3: "At Bridget's command, Support Force swiftly falls into formation."}
{3: 'You tuck the map into your pocket and start heading back.'}
